help-file.title: "DEATH KNIGHT"
help-file.content:
The Death Knight is a twisted form of a Lich. A race of undead warriors spawned by a demon prince (popular thought credits Demogorgon), from fallen human paladins. No one knows exactly why this was done except for the obvious explanation: The raising of an army that was never used. The perverted soul of the former paladin lives through eternal torment in its undead state, killing anything that will satisfy its rage at what has been done to it.
Allowable races: Anti-paladin, Warrior, Mercenary.
Death knight stats: Unlike Liches, Death Knights wear heavy armor and the weapons of warriors. They will usually be riding a nightmare which they often summon to do their bidding.
Innate abilities: Ultravision, summon mount, anti-good, vampiric touch, fireball, fireshield, firestorm, protection from fire
